channel.title: No sound effects play when you first pick up the MP5 and check the clip
channel.description:
Like the subject says, there are no sound effects that play during the animation when the MP5 clip is removed and re-inserted. I'm assuming this is the animation that happens when you first get the MP5.
Also, the muzzle flash is a little underwhelming as is the actual firing sound effect.
